name: Digital Realty Trust, Inc.
description: Digital Realty Trust, Inc. is a leading global provider of data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions. Founded in 2004 and headquartered in San Francisco, California, Digital Realty has established itself as a critical player in the digital infrastructure sector, supporting the growing demand for data storage and processing. The company operates more than 280 data centers across North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia, offering a diverse range of services tailored to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes. Digital Realty's facilities are designed to provide high levels of reliability, security, and performance, making them ideal for enterprises, cloud and IT service providers, and network operators. With a strong focus on innovation, Digital Realty is committed to enhancing the efficiency and sustainability of its operations through advanced technologies and green initiatives. The company also emphasizes strategic partnerships and collaborations to expand its service offerings and enhance customer experience in an increasingly digital world. As businesses continue to migrate towards cloud computing and hybrid IT environments, Digital Realty is well-positioned to capitalize on these trends, further solidifying its role as a leader in the data center industry.

seo.meta_title: Digital Realty Trust, Inc. | Leading Data Center Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Digital Realty Trust, Inc., a global leader in data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions. Discover how Digital Realty supports the digital economy.

faq.question: What services does Digital Realty offer?
faq.answer: Digital Realty offers data center services, including colocation, interconnection, and cloud services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Digital Realty?
faq.answer: A. William Stein is the CEO of Digital Realty Trust, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Digital Realty headquartered?
faq.answer: Digital Realty is headquartered in San Francisco, California, USA.
